column1: # warm-cache-prompts.tsv — Tool calls for warming server caches
# Lines starting with # are comments; blank lines are ignored.
# Derived from the Example Queries and 26 Research Scenarios in README.md.
# - compact: true is omitted from vocabulary-routed calls (it has no effect there)
# - Calls are ordered: vocabulary searches first (warm SQLite page cache),
# - Where an Example Query duplicates a Scenario call, it appears once under Example Queries

# 3. Tracking the Adoption of Artistic Techniques
# 4. Mapping the Visual Rhetoric of the Stadholders

# 7. Reading Inscriptions as Primary Sources (Saenredam painting search in Example Queries)
# 8. Dimensions as Evidence for Workshop Practice
# 13. Technical Art History at the Brushstroke Level
# 15. Reproductive Prints and Their Painted Sources
# 16. Tracing Career Evolution Through Subject and Place
# 20. Finding Thematic Connections Curators Have Already Made
# 21. Assessing Collection Depth for Grant Applications (Japan print search covered by Scenario 2/5)
# 22. Tracking New Acquisitions in a Research Area
# 23. Monitoring Catalogue Activity in a Research Area
# 24. Multilingual Access to a Dutch Collection
# 26. Geographic Research Without Knowing the Map
